summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Block 4, Lago Vista; Blocks 1 and 2, Winship's Addition, SW 1/4 SW1/4 of Section 9, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Tract 13, Fostoria Garden Tracts; SE1/4SW1/4 of Section 20, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; NW1/4SE1/4NE1/4 of Section 19, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; NW1/4 SE1/4 NE1/4 of Section 19, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; and Tract 43, Lake Ballinger Garden Tracts.
